Professional Make-Up class, Styling & Photoshoot

Learn how to do a professional make-up in Los Angeles

Professional Make-Up

Your local friend:

Saki

About:

Saki is a Los Angeles based self-taught make-up artist. She has successfully grown her brand @sakimakeupartist to more than 15K followers on Instagram with a super engaged audience. Originally hailing from Venezuela, Saki now calls LA home.

Sign up now to show interest and you'll be the first to know when we launch!

SIGN UP

Course Details:

Location: Los Angeles

Duration: 2 full days, 7 hours each day

Level: Beginner/All Levels

Price: $275 USD per course

What you'll learn:

Learn how to do a professional make-up like a pro make up artist.

Where we'll be:

Northridge Mall, Los Angeles

What I'll provide:

You will learn about what products to use for your skin tone and how to apply, what brushes to use and you will get a full professional makeover. After the class, you will learn how to apply make-up yourself and to finish off, we will do a professional make-up photo shoot where you will also learn how to edit your pictures and promote on instagram. BONUS! Instagram tips and tricks provided.

Good to know

Bring clothes for the photoshoot, anything strapless is good. It's also a good idea to bring your own make-up bag as I will help you "clean it up"!

Where we'll meet:

Northridge Mall, Los Angeles
